commitMessage:
feat(pm-integration): add PM-required feature creation with dynamic issue detection

Implements PM-required feature creation workflows that enable intelligent
handling of both targeted PM issues and new feature creation flows.

## What Changed

Implementation (7 files modified, 2 new test files):
- Added abstract `isValidIssueID()` method to BasePMAdapter interface
- Implemented adapter-specific ID detection:
  - LinearAdapter: Matches `PROJ-123` format

## Why This Change

Part of HODGE-377 Team Development epic. This sub-feature (377.2) builds on
HODGE-377.1's team mode detection by implementing the actual feature creation
workflows. Enables developers to:

1. Start with PM issue IDs (`/explore HOD-123`) for targeted work
2. Create PM issues after exploration (`--create-issue` flag)
3. Re-explore features when approaches need reconsideration (`--rerun`)

The two-step workflow (exploration approval â†’ PM issue creation â†’ file writing)
prevents orphaned PM issues while giving AI the feature ID it needs upfront.

## Impact

Developer Experience:
- Seamless PM integration - developers can use issue IDs or descriptions
- Intelligent ID detection - adapters recognize their own formats
- No orphaned issues - PM creation happens only after approval
- Explicit re-exploration - prevents accidental overwrites

Code Quality:
- Zero test failures (1,354 tests passing)
- Zero TypeScript errors
- Zero ESLint errors (21 acceptable warnings in pre-existing code)
- Excellent standards compliance per code review

Architecture:
- Adapter-agnostic workflow (Linear, GitHub, Local all use same pattern)
- Clean separation: CLI handles PM operations, AI handles content
- Progressive development: build phase stubs, harden phase full implementation
